mapper.insert:
insert into pro_classify_sub
id,
code,
name,
description,
icon_url,
fk_pro_classify_id,
fk_pro_classify_code,
fk_shp_shop_id,
type,
state,
sort,
insert_time,
update_time,
insert_admin,
update_admin,
versions,
del,
remark,
values
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{iconUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fkProClassifyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{fkProClassifyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fkShpShopId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{insertAdmin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{updateAdmin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{versions,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{del,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update pro_classify_sub
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon_url = #{iconUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fk_pro_classify_id = #{fkProClassifyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fk_pro_classify_code = #{fkProClassifyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fk_shp_shop_id = #{fkShpShopId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
insert_time = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
insert_admin = #{insertAdmin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_admin = #{updateAdmin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
versions = #{versions,jdbcType=INTEGER},
del = #{del,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id, code, name, SUBSTR(code,1,1) letter, type, del, remark from pro_classify_sub where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, code, name, description, SUBSTR(code,1,1) letter, type, fk_pro_classify_code as classifyCode from pro_classify_sub where del = '0' and fk_shp_shop_id in (-9,#{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}) and state = 1 order by CODE ASC
select name, description, icon_url 'iconUrl', SUBSTR(code,1,1) letter from pro_classify_sub where del = '0' and fk_shp_shop_id in (-9) and state = 1 order by CODE ASC

select id, code, name, description, icon_url 'iconUrl', SUBSTR(code,1,1) letter from pro_classify_sub where del = '0' and fk_shp_shop_id =-9
and fk_pro_classify_code like CONCAT('%',#{classifyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
order by CODE ASC

select id, code, name, description from pro_classify_sub where del = '0' and name=#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and fk_shp_shop_id in(-9,#{shopId}) and state =1
and fk_shp_shop_id =-9
limit 1

select id, code, name, description, icon_url, fk_pro_classify_id, fk_pro_classify_code, fk_shp_shop_id, type, state, sort, insert_time, update_time, insert_admin, update_admin, versions, del, remark from pro_classify_sub where del = '0' and name=#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and fk_shp_shop_id != -9

select id, icon_url 'iconUrl', state, fk_pro_classify_code as classifyCode, name from pro_classify_sub where del = '0'
and fk_pro_classify_code = #{classifyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
order by id desc

select id, code, name, description, icon_url, fk_pro_classify_id, fk_pro_classify_code, fk_shp_shop_id, type, state, sort, insert_time, update_time, insert_admin, update_admin, versions, del, remark from pro_classify_sub where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and del = '0'
